name: @sjcrh/proteinpaint-shared
description: ProteinPaint code that is shared between server and client-side workspaces

scripts.build: esbuild src/*.ts --platform=node --outdir=src/ --format=esm && prettier --no-semi --use-tabs --write src/urljson.js src/joinUrl.js src/time.js src/doc.js
scripts.test-x: ls src/test/*.spec* | xargs -I % bash -c '{ tsx %; sleep 0.001; }'
